thread.title: Senior Management Accountant

title: Senior Management Accountant
text:
Job Ref: HQ00070554 
As the Senior Management Accountant you will be responsible for preparing the global report and analysis used by the firms managing partners, providing a worldwide view of the firm's financial performance to be able to support the Global Finance Director. 
Key responsibilities for this role involved reviewing and consolidating worldwide view of variance analysis of the firm's results between Actual, Forecast and Budget, preparing a summary for the Group Finance Manager and Global Finance Director. You will also be providing the global department heads with a worldwide view of their costs and assisting them with interpreting, understanding and influencing the numbers, quarterly production of the worldwide cash flow statement for inclusion in management accounts pack and monitoring the headcount reporting within financial reports to achieve consistency with the cost centre reporting. 
Providing strong support the senior management is a big part of this role so you will be involved in regular meetings with/for the Global Finance Director creating financial models and preparing PowerPoint presentations. 
To be successful in your application for the Senior Management Accountant role you must be a qualified accountant (ACA/ACCA/CIMA) with a wealth of experience in large scale global consolidation work and reporting and analysis for heads of department. You must be a strong communicator with the abilities to influence, analyse and interpret large amounts of financial data. If this sounds like you, apply now!
